Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I've been playing kerbal for a while now and lurking the forums, but ive never actually posted anything, so here is a plane Ive been working on for a few hours,

due to a bug with the air intakes, the tail fins like to explode as soon as the plane loads (no matter how many struts, believe me i tried) so just use unbreakable parts and no crash damage, as

im not sure which one fixes the bug, but it works if you use both.

here is a link to the imgur album:

http://imgur.com/a/iKJ54

and here is the craft file:

https://rapidshare.com/files/2005442061/CFA-44%20Nosferatu.craft

mods used are minimal, only a few parts due to the complexity of this plane (and making it look good of course :3 )

1. B-9 aerospace

2. SM-S plane pack

Im using version 2.02

have fun

Edited July 3, 2013 by Bleekosa

Excellent! I was wondering when someone would try their hand at recreating this unique design from Ace Combat. Props for making it so close to the original design!

Edited July 3, 2013 by Amloris

Excellent! I was wondering when someone would try their hand at recreating this unique design from Ace Combat. Props for making it so close to the original design!

Thanks, it took me ages to work out the kinks, and I'm still tweaking it
you mind if i give making this plane a try???

you mind if i give making this plane a try???

That's what the download link is for.
